Description: Suspicious outbound connections to known C2 server
RecommendedActions: Block IP at firewall; investigate affected systems

Description: Ransomware executable detected on multiple systems
RecommendedActions: Isolate affected systems; run full antivirus scan

Description: Phishing domain used in email campaigns
RecommendedActions: Block domain at DNS level; user awareness training
Block URL; scan systems that accessed it

Description: Spoofed email from fake financial institution
RecommendedActions: Block sender; review email security rules

Description: Source IP participating in DDoS attack
RecommendedActions: Block IP; monitor for additional attacks
Search for hash in environment; change compromised credentials
Remove registry entry; scan for additional artifacts

Description: Suspicious svchost.exe process with unusual network activity
Suspicious DNS queries indicating data exfiltration
RecommendedActions: Monitor DNS traffic; block suspicious queries
Block PowerShell execution; investigate user account

Description: Service account showing signs of compromise
RecommendedActions: Reset password; review account permissions; enable MFA
